definition: to act for sb else/to act on sb's behalf/an agent/a diplomatic representative/a chargé d'affaires
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with

sentences.english: The vice-adviser advised the reviser to devise adevice for getting rid of vice.
sentences.chinese: 代办顾问发起校订者想出一个根除败行的计谋。

sentences.english: The vice-adviser advised the reviser to devise a device forgetting rid of vice.
sentences.chinese: 代办参谋倡议校正者想出一个铲除恶习的计谋。

sentences.english: We can renew the agreement of agency on its expiry.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以在代办别人代理协议期满时续订。

sentences.english: The commission-revenue maximization exchange innovates futures contract.
sentences.chinese: 代办收入最大化交换促成期货合约的创新。

sentences.english: The declarations papers is short of company's stamp and signature by agent.
sentences.chinese: 没有代办署理公司白勺印章和签名。

sentences.english: This list of tasks becomes the Sprint Backlog.
sentences.chinese: 任务的列表就成了所谓的代办冲刺。

sentences.english: When unable to call back if they should be entrusted to another agency.
sentences.chinese: 如果自己确实无法亲自回电，应托付他人代办。

sentences.english: I have my to-do lists and my Waiting For list, and that's good enough.
sentences.chinese: 我有代办列表和等待列表，这已经足够。

sentences.english: In order to encourage your participation, there is no processing fee for this pilot test.
sentences.chinese: 为了鼓励考生参加，此次预试免收代办费。

sentences.english: The post and telecommunications agency shall be considered to be the branch office of postal enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 邮电代办所视同邮政企业所属的分支机构。

sentences.english: Li Zhiguo, Charge d'Affaires of China's Embassy in South Sudan also attended the above activities.
sentences.chinese: 我驻南苏丹使馆临时代办李志国参加了上述活动。

sentences.english: Wre not prepared to take the agency into consideration for the time being.
sentences.chinese: 今朝我们还不筹备考虑代办署理问题。

sentences.english: Our company has angencies all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 本公司在全世界都有代办处。

sentences.english: What does your to-do list look like?
sentences.chinese: 你的代办清单是什么样的呢？

sentences.english: Your best protection is the charged'affaires .
sentences.chinese: 能为你提供最有效的保护的是代办。

sentences.english: Free agency of documents making, examination of letter of credit, agency of freight insurance.
sentences.chinese: 免费代理制单，审阅信用证，代办货运保险。

definition: to receive sth on another's behalf
to fill in a form for sb else
to renew a certificate (ID card etc)/to leave an ID at the desk to gain entrance
